mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_movie VALUES (#{item.movieId},#{item.movieName},#{item.movieRelease},#{item.movieRating},#{item.movieType},#{item.movieInfo}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE movieName = VALUES(movieName), movieRelease = VALUES(movieRelease), movieRating = VALUES(movieRating), movieType = VALUES(movieType), movieInfo = VALUES(movieInfo);
INSERT INTO tbl_image VALUES (#{item.imgId},#{item.imgLink}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE imgLink = VALUES(imgLink)
mapper.select: SELECT MOVIEID, MOVIENAME, MOVIERELEASE, MOVIERATING, MOVIETYPE, MOVIEINFO FROM tbl_movie ORDER BY MOVIEID ASC LIMIT #{skip}, #{amount}

SELECT M.MOVIEID, M.MOVIENAME, M.MOVIERELEASE, M.MOVIERATING, M.MOVIETYPE, M.MOVIEINFO, (SELECT IMG_LINK FROM tbl_image I WHERE I.IMG_ID = M.MOVIEID) AS IMG_LINK FROM tbl_movie M WHERE MOVIEID = #{movieId}
